TITLE: AI-Facilitated Collaborative Learning
DEF: Include an AI persona in group-learning to benefit from the modified social dynamics
TASK: The AI-Facilitated Collaborative Learning pattern enhances group learning experiences by leveraging AI. The AI is instrumental in content curation, group formation, real-time feedback, and tracking progress, thus nurturing communication, critical thinking, and cooperation among learners. To effectively implement this pattern, balance AI utility with human interaction and ensure learners take active roles in their learning journey.
